title: Ticket #1224: Remove -xml option from batch_test.pl
description:
The "-xml" option in condor_scripts/batch_test.pl appears to be unused, to be incomplete, and to have diverged from developer that has happened since.. It's implemented by scattering "if($isXML)" throughout, complicating working on batch_test.pl.

Remove the -xml option and all related code
creator: adesmet
